InstructionData.Title: GRH_-_GROW_LIGHTS_CONTROLLER
InstructionData.Author: D4RK GH0ST
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Script name: Grow Lights Controller # Description: # Author: Werner L. Gottschalt ## START
define GrowLights -1758710260
alias DaylightSensor d0 alias LightTimeDial d1 alias SolarAngleDisplay d2 alias SunLight r12 alias MaxSunLight r13
Main: l SunLight DaylightSensor SolarAngle l MaxSunLight LightTimeDial Setting s SolarAngleDisplay Setting SunLight #if SunLight less than MaxSunLight GrowLights = ON brgt SunLight MaxSunLight 3 s SolarAngleDisplay Color 3 sb GrowLights On 1
brlt SunLight MaxSunLight 3 s SolarAngleDisplay Color 1 sb GrowLights On 0 j Main
## END
